tool.name: pl.filter_genes_dispersion
tool.description: Plot dispersions versus means for genes.

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc @CMD_set_figure_params
sc.pl.filter_genes_dispersion( result = '$result', log = '$log', show = '$show', save = '$save',)

param.name: show
param.label: show
param.help: Show the plot, do not return axis.

param.name: save
param.label: save
param.help: If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {{'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}}.

tool.help:
Plot dispersions versus means for genes.
Produces Supp. Fig. 5c of Zheng et al. (2017) and MeanVarPlot() of Seurat.
Parameters ---------- result : `np.recarray` Result of :func:`~scanpy.api.pp.filter_genes_dispersion`. log : `bool` Plot on logarithmic axes. show : bool, optional (default: `None`) Show the plot, do not return axis. save : `bool` or `str`, optional (default: `None`) If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {{'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}}.
